div.p: Per Governor Noem's announcement on Monday, April 6th, 2020, Elk Point-Jefferson School District will be closed through the remainder of this school year.

div.h1: Welcome to Elk Point-Jefferson Featured Content

div.p: Welcome to the Elk Point-Jefferson School District website. We hope our website provides you with the necessary information you need. If you require further information, please call us at (605) 356-5950.
